## ConversationOptions.adapterConfig property

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

If `adapter` is not provided, this `adapterConfig` will be passed to the new `BotFrameworkAdapter` when created internally.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
adapterConfig?: {
        [key: string]: unknown;
    };
```

## Remarks

If neither `adapter` nor `adapterConfig` is provided, will use BOT\_ID and BOT\_PASSWORD from environment variables.
